brokenToken: The selected token is not compatible with Uniswap V1. Adding liquidity will result in locked funds.
toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
activity: Provide Liquidity For Decentralized Exchange And Earn CSM!
activityDesc: CSM is an ERC20 standard token designed by Crust Network to encourage users to participate in storage activities. In order to encourage users to experience our testnet and personal cloud product, we will launch an activity task of "Complete the storage task and activate the CSM reward". Users who complete the task can exchange CSM for CRU at a 1:1 ratio.
readMore: Read more on: 《Crust Token Indicators & Economics》
step1Desc1: Currently, it supports LP tokens in three trading pairs: USDT/CRU, ETH/CRU and USDC/CRU
step1Desc2: If you have not provide liquidity, please click the Add Liquidity button
step2: Step2：Choose a trading pool and stake LP token
step2Desc1: The release speed of CSM is different in these three pools, please check first
step3: Step3：Stake/withdraw LP Token and get CSM reward
step3Desc1: Click Deposit to stake your LP token, click Withdraw to take out your LP token and CSM rewards, click Claim to take out CSM :w rewards
outputHint: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than {{slippage}}%, your transaction will revert.
addLiquidityHint: By adding liquidity you'll earn 0.3% of all trades on this pair proportional to your share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
confirmInWallet: Confirm this transaction in your wallet
withdrawHint: When you withdraw, your CSM is claimed and your liquidity is removed from the mining pool.
claimWithoutWithdrawHint: When you claim without withdrawing your liquidity remains in the mining pool.
